properties.description: 수요기관정보조회

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_t      
 WHERE  date_time BETWEEN '@{variables('begin_Date')}' AND '@{variables('end_Date')}'
 and obsr_Spot_Code = '@{variables('obsr_Spot_Code')}'
 ;
 
select 1 as success
